_comment: This is a template file for adding new photos to the 2600 gallery
_instructions: 1. Copy a photo entry from below
2. Update all fields with your actual photo data
3. Add the entry to the 2600.json file in the 'photos' array
4. Make sure the filename matches your actual photo file in /frontend/public/images/photos/2600/
5. Increment display_order for each new photo

photo_template.caption: Brief description of what's in the photo
photo_template.notes: Optional: Any interesting details about the phone, location, or context

sample_entries.caption: Vintage payphone near Grand Central Terminal
sample_entries.notes: One of the last working payphones in Midtown

sample_entries.caption: Graffiti-covered phone booth in Mission District
sample_entries.notes: Phone no longer functional but booth remains as street art
